Game.Name: Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '89 (Japan)
Game.plot: Overview:Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '89 ("This is Professional Baseball '89") is a baseball game for the PC Engine and the first of two games with the Kore ga Pro Yakyuu brand, followed by Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '90. It features twelve teams from the Nippon Professional Baseball organization as it was in 1989.The game resembles most baseball games of the era, with a behind-the-batter perspective when pitching and batting and a top-down view when fielding.Cheat: Misc. CodesChoose Pennant Mode and a 130 Days game. Then pick the Taiyo Whales, which is the 4th team from the top. Now, at the score screen where it says "Pennant Race", press the following buttons:Cheat: Misc. CodesAt the "Open Mode", after choosing your Team and the CPU's Team, press Left or Right to change who pitches first.Cheat: Hidden Monsters TeamAt the Pennant or Vs Modes, enter the password screen and input the letter "G" 110 times and for the 10 remaining spaces, enter the very first Japanese character (top-left). Now hit End and you'll be able to play with the Hidden Monsters Team.Cheat: Hidden Monsters TeamAt the Pennant or Vs Mode password screen, enter the first Japanese character and then the second one. Do this 60 more times until the password screen is filled. Now, start the game and you'll play with a special Dragons Team.
Game.Notes: Kore ga Pro Yakyuu '89 is a Sports game, developed by TOSE and published by Intec, which was released in Japan in 1989.
